attributes.action: Establish Saint David's Day (the 1st of March) as a public holiday in Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Saint David's Day should be established as a public holiday in Wales in the same way that Ireland has a bank holiday on Saint Patrick's day.

In a recent pole nearly nine out of 10 people in Wales agree with this statement.

Each nation should have a public holiday to celebrate its patron saint.

government_responses.details:
